summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1388, for the improvement of East Union Street, from Thirtieth Avenue to Thirty-fifth Avenue all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and by constructing concrete walks thereon; under Ordinance No. 15118 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
